project_metadata.description: A robust system for automated claim verification and fact-checking, encompassing claim submission, evidence retrieval, natural language inference analysis, and comprehensive report generation.

bounded_contexts.description: Manages the user interface for submitting claims, displaying the final verification reports, and interacting with the system's outputs.

entities.name: ClaimSubmission
entities.description: Represents a user's initial input of a claim to be verified.

entities.name: VerificationReport
entities.description: The comprehensive output of the claim verification process, presented to the user.

value_objects.name: ClaimText
value_objects.description: The literal text of the claim provided by the user, with length constraints.

value_objects.name: SubmissionTimestamp
value_objects.description: The exact date and time when the claim was submitted.

value_objects.name: VerdictLabel
value_objects.description: A categorical label indicating the final truthfulness assessment of a claim.

value_objects.name: SourceLink
value_objects.description: A clickable reference to an external information source, displayed to the user.

bounded_contexts.description: Specializes in automatically searching for and retrieving relevant external evidence to evaluate claims.

entities.name: EvidenceRequest
entities.description: An orchestration unit responsible for executing searches and gathering evidence for a specific claim.

entities.name: SearchTool
entities.description: Configuration and access details for an external search API or data source.

entities.name: TrustedDomainList
entities.description: A curated and strictly managed collection of web domains considered reliable for evidence retrieval.

value_objects.name: SearchQuery
value_objects.description: A specific phrase or term used to search for evidence.

value_objects.name: EvidenceItem
value_objects.description: A single piece of retrieved information, typically a text snippet, along with its source.

value_objects.name: DomainName
value_objects.description: A string representing a web domain, used for filtering trusted sources.

bounded_contexts.description: Houses the core logic for natural language inference (NLI), evaluating claims against evidence, and generating truth scores and reasoning.

entities.name: ClaimVerificationEvaluation
entities.description: The process of analyzing a claim and its supporting evidence to produce an NLI result, confidence, truth score, and reasoning.

entities.name: FineTunedInferenceEngine
entities.description: An operational instance of a specialized NLI model configured for real-time claim assessment.

entities.name: NLIModelDeployment
entities.description: Manages the lifecycle, configuration, and performance monitoring of deployed NLI models.

value_objects.name: EvidenceText
value_objects.description: The aggregated and concatenated textual content from multiple evidence snippets, used for NLI input.

value_objects.name: NLIResult
value_objects.description: The primary classification output from the Natural Language Inference model.

value_objects.name: ConfidenceScore
value_objects.description: A numerical score indicating the NLI model's certainty in its classification.

value_objects.name: TruthScore
value_objects.description: A percentage score representing the assessed truthfulness of a claim.

value_objects.name: ReasoningText
value_objects.description: A generated textual explanation justifying the claim's truth score and verdict.

value_objects.name: F1Score
value_objects.description: A metric used to evaluate the performance of the NLI model, combining precision and recall.

value_objects.name: ModelConfiguration
value_objects.description: Details describing the architecture, training methodology, and dataset used for an NLI model.
